𓊨 sit steh stätte
𓊍 шат šat ўсхо́ды ŭsxódy саты saty шаты şatıʳ stair 𓊍 Stiege Steg Steiger stǣger stair stgala 𒄑𒌉𒂠 ĝešᵗkuĝ₅ •Gestiege 𓊍 scarã σκάλα skála scale scālae escalera escalièr •gescalum 𒄑𒃴 ĝeš'galam ! 𓊍 skip 𒄑𒌉𒂠 #askuppu step 𓊎 step stop ŝtuparo stolper стълбище stǎlbište (Stufe) sTreppe trappsteg trap strepīd strophe 𓊎 step ступе́ньки stupénʹki прысту́пка prystúpka საფეხური sapexuri тепкич s'tepkiç 𓊎 step see mastaba step pyramid 𓉵 𓉷 𓉴 𓉶 𓊎 #simmiltu 𒋆𒅖𒌅 sim-mil-ˢtuʳ Schemel Stieg stair(case) staircase

𓊍 מדרגה madregá ⇔ drag trag track strecke κλίμακα klímaka climb

𒄑𒅇𒀸𒆪 ĝeš u₃-AŠ.KUˡ uAŠKUˡ escalièr escalera scale σκάλα skála <> scandō ascend descend 𒄑𒅇𒀸𒆪 ĝeš-u₃-AŠ.KUʳ case-askur staircase सीढ़ी sīṛhī as-daraj دَرَج

𒄑𒃴 ĝeš'galam •gescalum escalièr scale, staircase, ladder

𒄑𒌉𒂠 ĝešᵗkuĝ₅ •Gestiege stǣger stair(case); ladder; threshold

𒄑𒌉𒂠;𒄿𒇻;𒄑𒄿𒇻;𒌉𒂠;𒈝 ĝešᵗkuĝ₅ kun₄;ĝeš kuĝ₄;kun₅;ĝeš kuĝₓ 𒄿𒇻 cinqlu ≈ kung = kuĝ ☑

Japanese: 階段 (ja) (かいだん, kaidan)
Khmer: កាំជណ្ដើរ (kam cŭəndaə)
Korean: 계단 (ko) (gyedan)

𓂋 𓂧 𓌗 𓊍 | stairway | > stair 𓂧 𓌗 𓊍 ⋍ 𓋴 𓂋 𓂧 𓇟 reverse permutation or omission

𓂋 𓂧 𓌗 𓇟 𓏜 | prosperous, prosper | rich, reach
𓂋 𓂧 𓌗 𓊍 | stairway | reach ⇔ road ? < portaat
𓂋 𓅱 𓂧 𓊍 | stairway | rappuset @ Uralic > rvδi > 楼梯 lóutī
𓂋 𓂧 𓌗 | grow | rise

𓋴 𓇟 𓂋 𓂧 𓌗 | growth > rise
𓋴 𓇟 𓂋 𓂧 𓌗 | Sart > Saat
𓋴 𓂋 𓂧 𓇟 | erect (monuments) | surgere surge erguer-se +++ go-rise
